name: Apollonia Holiday Apartments

reviews.text: We have just returned this week from a 10 day stay at the Apollonian apartments in a 2bed apartment and would not stay anywhere else in Paphos. It is true what everyone else has said the apartments are spotless and eveything you need in them. The pool area is one of the cleaness I have been to. The whole family cannot do enough for you and honesty bar at the pool is fantastic.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If we go back to Paphos we would only stay there. A big thank you for making our holiday special.
reviews.title: Great Apartments and Fantastic Hospitality

reviews.text: Myself and wife have just returned from 2 weeks stay and can confirm that all the good things written by other visitors to the Apollonia Apartments are most certainly true. The apartments have everything you will ever need and the attention by the staff is second to none. Perfect location for a short walk to town centre and far enough away not to hear any noise from bar street. If i return to Paphos would not consider any other accommodation.
reviews.title: The best holiday arpartment's, the best family running it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well how do we start !, To say simpily the best arpartments is an undersratment,the whole Apollonia experiance is to be belived, Ihave stayed 5 time's, and this year i went with my 12 year old grandauter as her first trip abroard, well when she got there you would think she belonged to the family,She slotted right in, Young Maria and My kelsie hit it off straight away,and off they went best of friends Horse riding, swimming,, meals out,Girly stuff on facebook Neadless to say she is going back with me next year,If you could sell what the family have with the welcome and friendlyness you would be millionaires,The arpartment's are spotless staff friendly,The self service bar, pay when you remember. This is the benchmark in hospitality and i am going back in september 2012 again. Dave Geddes And Kelsie Howie
reviews.title: Cypriot hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff at Apollonia Apartments really do want you to enjoy your holiday. It started when I received immediate and helpful replies to all my email questions. I felt that we were going somewhere where we were truly 'expected' and welcomed. Nothing was too much trouble for them. Little wonder that we found people coming back year after year.
reviews.title: As expected

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this great apartaments in march and it was the best choice, we could not be disappointed. It was quiet and the rooms are very clean and very well equipped with many extras.
reviews.title: Very good apartments

reviews.text: Our room was a ground floor apartment and the price we booked our holyday was a too cheap for the quality .....best place in Paphos.
reviews.title: Simply the best.....

reviews.text: I'm loathe to actually say just how good the apollonia apartments are as I'm afraid that next time I try to book they have been inundated with clients trying to book........that's just how good it is there. They have thought about every little detail that you might need on holiday and they have gone out of their way to provide it. The apartments are just 5 minutes from the centre of paphos but you never hear any of the noise from bar street and it is the perfect place for a stress free, quiet holiday in the sun. You should try Apollonia, you'll love it....just don't book when I want to go...ha, ha!!
reviews.title: Best apartments in Paphos

reviews.text: A friend and I stayed last September. We had a ground floor apartment, which was perfect for my friend who has mobility problems. It was quiet, comfortable, and well equipped. We liked the way the garden was layed out with its winding paths and hedges, which made a nice barrier between the apartments and the pool (and look very pretty at night). The pool area is very nice, with plenty of beds - and plenty of cats! Maria, Kyriacos and their staff are wonderfully helpful. Marks out of 10? 20!
reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!

reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 weeks returning only a few days ago. We chose this accommodation purely on the TripAdvisor ratings & we weren't disappointed. We (My husband & I plus a 2 year old son) stayed in a one bedroom ground floor apartment. The apartments are spotlessly clean, the extras are fantastic (Cotton buds, air freshener, tissues, tea, coffee, beer, wine, tea towels, first aid kit ........ the list goes on & on) The kitchen is fully equipped - none of this one ring cooker & one saucepan. Everyone is very friendly & helpful & the pool area is lovely. The location is great - only a 5 minute walk to the harbour & a bus stop outside (bus fare is 1 euro each way to wherever you go - bargain). I fully recommend this property to all visitors - families, couples & solo. Going self catering gives the opportunity to sample the excellent, & very reasonable, restaurants there are in the Harbour area. At times it felt like we were in our own villa as the pool area was so quiet - we will be back :)
reviews.title: We just chilled.......................

reviews.text: I am currently staying at the Apollonia Apartments and I'm thoroughly enjoying my time here...wish I could stay longer. I made the booking based upon reviews on TripAdvisor and they are so true. Kyriacos and Maria are very friendly and are a wealth of great advice, they are willing to help with any queries you may have.
reviews.title: Fantastically equipped apartment with ultra friendly family run business

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Kyriacos even took me shopping the other day to the fruit markets and gave me a lesson on what is good local fresh fruit and what is 'fruit for tourists'.
reviews.title: Highly recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartment is well kitted out with everything you could want. They are clean and well-maintained.
reviews.title: Second Visit

reviews.text: The swimming pool area is spotless and there are always sunbeds available.
reviews.title: Spotless ,friendly well run apartments

reviews.text: There is an honesty bar in use (beers, cold drinks, ice-creams, crisps) however I chose to use the local supermarket which isn't much cheaper, but I could control my limited Euros that way. The supermarket is just a 2 minute walk away from the apartments.
reviews.title: June 2012
Very nice
reviews.text: We stayed in August, based on previous reviews. We were very pleased. The accommodation was well looked after, clean and met all our requirements. The staff were great, always willing to assist whilst leaving you to enjoy yourselves. The system of self service at the pool then paying later is a great idea as you get what you want, when you want it and don't have to wait to be served. If you decide on Paphos we have no hesitation in recommending these apartments.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3rd stay at this lovely complex! So relaxing and stress free, we always leave the Apollonia feeling soooooooooooo rested and totally chillaxed! Cannot say anymore than what has already been said previously........5*........we just love this place, the people who we meet here, from previous stays and new comers..........such a friendly welcoming place that is totally unique in the best possible way x To Kyriacos, Maria, George, Nikos, Jenny, Erica, all the staff, cutie Anabelle and the lovely cats.........a massive "Thank You"! and see you all again in June xxx
reviews.title: Fab-u-lous !

reviews.text: What can I say? Coming since more than 5 years 2 to 3 times a year.
reviews.title: Best place to stay

reviews.text: It´s like coming home, there´s no better place to stay!
reviews.title: Very Happy

reviews.text: Feeling like a part of the family. Always a warm wellcome, always hard to say good bye.
reviews.title: Perfect Relaxing Holiday With Friends in a Super Friendly Small Complex

reviews.text: Eight of us stayed here for ten days in June, and had a wonderful time. We can confirm that the apartments are spotless and well equipped, and nothing is too much trouble for the staff. The pool area is delightful, with sun beds to spare whilst we were there.
reviews.title: ''customer care second to none''

reviews.text: Like most people we booked after reading the reviews of others, and here I would have to agree with those that suggested that this was not 'luxury' accommodation. It isn't. However it's still worth five stars in my book, it's a family run business that goes out of it's way to please, and delivers customer care and value for money that is second to none.
reviews.title: Fabulous!
let down with booking
reviews.text: Just back from my second visit and had another relaxing time, in fact it felt like going home!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartments are equipped with everything you could possibly need and much more. Everyone is so helpful and nothing is too much trouble. Even the honesty bar is cheap as chips - 1 Euro for a can of Keo!
reviews.title: Chill week in sunny cyprus at the Apollonia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's also the little touches that mean so much like when Kyriacos comes round and buys drinks for everyone round the pool out of the blue, or when bowls of fresh watermelon or cherries are brought to your sunbed! Always enough sunbeds and always spotlessly clean. Don't bother taking any books - there a big bookcases dotted around full of all sorts.
reviews.title: The Best Apartments in Paphos

description: Apollonia Holiday Apartments are run by the Constandinou family. Guests can enjoy quality, self-catering holidays (and longer stay accommodation) in studios, one or two bedroom apartments. Apollonia is centrally located in the heart of the Paphos tourist area. Guests receive real Cypriot hospitality with a friendly welcoming service, being treated as friends and members of the extended family. Because holidays should be an unforgettable experience, Apollonia has made sure that all apartments are furnished and equipped to a very high standard. The reputation for hospitality, care and attention to detail offered by the family, is unique to Apollonia (read Tripadvisor reviews!).
